title: I bought RP like 10 hours ago and I still haven't received it.
body: Which sucks because I would like to have {{champion:432}}

replies.body: well i bought rp and then 3 secconds later i was permad shit fucking company

That's quite a wait!  The process can take a bit depending on the method used.  Your best bet is to check to see if it's still processing and wait for it to finalize, but you can hit up our billing team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to double check for you and make sure everything is going smoothly.
